description: Enumerate ALL acceptance criteria permutations. Apply exhaustive logic decomposition at AC level.

do.description: List all validation paths and calculation branches
do.content: When user enters STR rank, then system validates (1-20 range) - When user enters invalid rank, then system shows error - When user enters valid rank, then system calculates modifier

dont.content: When user enters rank, then system saves (missing validation and calculation ACs)
